jobDescription: SALES SUPPORT/ CUSTOMER SERVICE Must be highly motivated & energetic with the ability to take initiative. Must also have very strong organizational and computer skills with experience in a manufacturing environment preferred. Responsible for supporting sales staff by providing administrative, clerical, and customer support. Follows up with customers, order entry and assisting Sales Department with new projects. Primary Responsibilities Answer telephone calls and assist customers  Enter orders and handle customer inquiries, as well as working with internal departments to process orders  Drafts and provides proposals for customers' RFQ's - maintains quote database  Respond to e-mails and other forms of correspondence  Maintain client database  Track new projects  Packing up and sending out samples Requirements Associate degree required (Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or related field preferred)  Strong knowledge of MS Excel, Word, Google Docs, Access and Outlook  Job Type: Full-time
